amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce specific accounts that were increased over and above the President's request by $1.8 billion.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part A of House Report 111-578 to cut $1.8 billion from specific accounts that were increased over and above the President's request.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Latham amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 197 - 225 (Roll no. 489).
